name: Mister Squiddly
description:
- Controls -
Use the "Up" arrow key or "W" key to swim.
Use the "Left" and "Right" arrow keys or "A" and "W" keys to turn Mister Squiddly.

- Description -
Mister Squiddly is a short game about swimming back home to your family.
Make sure you pick up enough stars to feed your family and survive.
Good luck!

Thanks to Kenny Game Assets for images and tiles.
Thanks to BeepBox for music.
